user.content: I've been extremely busy with work lately and can't seem to increase my writing speed. Is there any way to help me write faster?

assistant.content: Alright, sorry this suggestion wasn't helpful. Feel free to let me know if you have any other questions!

user.content: Yes, blue-light-blocking glasses aren't very effective, and artificial tears only provide temporary relief with no long-term benefits.

user.content: This idea is quite good. I've also heard of humidifiers; they should be quite convenient to use.

user.content: Frank communication sounds good, but I'm worried that bringing it up abruptly might make the relationship more tense.
